title: Angel
description: Carren, brilliant writer with capabilities in the areas of thought and creativity, discovers that her latest book is not the figment of her imagination and that her hero is real! And if it was not an ordinary human? But what if this level of transcendent intelligence brings with it another world? Reth Whits is a profiler sent by the NSA to Paris five years ago. Now, his mission: find the Author, the genius behind a mysterious conspiracy that threatens humanity. But when Reth learns that the plot is only the tip of the iceberg, he is plunged into the labyrinth of his completely unknown own past and it becomes a key player in a deadly game - that of traveling through time and parallel worlds. A game that is sure to have a dramatic impact on the future of humanity.
author: CVA
